list-view-config.query-base:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX afn: <http://jena.hpl.hp.com/ARQ/function#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?authorship ?infoResource ?infoResourceName ?dateTime WHERE { ?subject ?property ?authorship OPTIONAL { ?authorship core:linkedInformationResource ?infoResource . ?infoResource rdfs:label ?infoResourceName OPTIONAL { ?infoResource core:dateTimeValue ?dateTimeValue . ?dateTimeValue core:dateTime ?dateTime } } } ORDER BY DESC(?dateTime) ?infoResourceName
list-view-config.query-collated:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX core: <http://vivoweb.org/ontology/core#> PREFIX afn: <http://jena.hpl.hp.com/ARQ/function#>
SELECT DISTINCT ?subclass ?authorship ?infoResource ?infoResourceName ?dateTime WHERE { ?subject ?property ?authorship OPTIONAL { ?authorship core:linkedInformationResource ?infoResource . ?infoResource rdfs:label ?infoResourceName OPTIONAL { ?subclass rdfs:subClassOf core:InformationResource . ?infoResource a ?subclass } OPTIONAL { ?infoResource core:dateTimeValue ?dateTimeValue . ?dateTimeValue core:dateTime ?dateTime } } } ORDER BY ?subclass DESC(?dateTime) ?infoResourceName
